UPDATE:
STEAM GREENLIGHT


Greetings Web-Travelers!

My teammates and I are very, very, pleased and excited to announce to you our first, and ambitious, text-adventure indie videogame:
Just One Line.



Just One Line (JOL) is a fantasy Choose Your Own Adventure videogame mixed with Roleplaying Game, score-based multiplayer and character sharing features.


Game Description:
Create your character choosing from a list of races and backgrounds and embark on a variety of quests heavily focused on choices and consequences.
Your character will progress by increasing his/her renown and relations with the factions of the kingdom, unlocking new races and backgrounds for your next playthroughs.
Every quest you embark on is composed by multiple scenes. A scene is composed by a description and from one to four choices. Some choices are always available, while others may not be shown unless you match its prerequisites (your character being of a given race/background, having that mighty sword with you or not, and so on). In addition, many of your choices are stored by the game allowing us to entangle the story-line of all our quests with one another.
Some choices have a check on your character as well: you may succeed or fail at those depending on your statistics, equipment or previous choices. Beware! Some choices could lead you into deadly combats (yes, we also feature a text-based combat system), traps, and all sort of perils and once your character dies... he/she dies and that's it! Create a new hero and start all over again with an entirely different story.
As you progress through the game, you will face moral dilemmas and your reputation in the eyes of the world and the factions will change accordingly.
Last but not the least, you can resign your hero/villain. In doing so, you will send the score and statistics of your character to our online leaderboard but you won't be able to play as them anymore... Just create a new character and start over again! There will be time-framed online events such as the most evil of the month, the richest of the week, and so on and forth.
Once the character is on the leaderboard, he/she will also be browsable and sharable: apart from their stats, you will send their look (and equipment), achievements and one of the several titles he/she may have earned during their adventurous life!
The decision to have your character participating to the online leaderboard is completely up to you. If you are not into competitive gaming, or you want to keep your characters for yourself, fear not: you can just resign them.


Game Features:
[list]
[*]Choices MATTER: a lot of games say so, but we think none truly mean it. All our quests are linked together and have different paths according to your race, background, attributes and choices made in previous quests. (see more…)
[/*:m]
[*]YOUR character, YOUR story: build your character as you wish. Start by choosing a race and background, go ahead with some aesthetic customization and finally shape him into a valorous hero or a ruthlessa villain. Morality and honor will change according to your choices. (see more…)
[/*:m]
[*]High replay value: quests’ spawn is semi-random and every quest has interactions or even entire branches only acessible to certain backgrounds/previous quests’ choices! Everytime you play, your story changes.
[/*:m]
[*]Will you be the best? When you resign your character you can compete with other players in the leaderboards to be the most renowned hero of the kingdom! (see more…)
[/*:m]
[*]Short stories, deep stories: we believe wall of texts are NOT needed for engaging the player, Just One Line is our motto. Quest telling is thrilling yet short and straightforward.
[/*:m]
[*]All about immersion: we feature a unique set of locations in fancy 3D graphics and a mesmerizing OST to aid your imagination when embarking on epic quests. You will be amazed! (see more…)
[/*:m]
[*]Innovative yet conservative: the concept of our game is a breath of fresh air! However, you could expect everything a role-playing gamer has come to know: races, classes, skills, magic, powerful weapons, unique armors and ancient artifacts.[/*:m][/list:u]

Techs:
JOL is powered by Unity3D Game Engine + in-house tools.


Current Dev Status:
Pre-Alpha.
Current Target Platforms: PC Windows and Linux.
Release date: 2016, TBD.


How to support JOL?
We are very proud of our videogame. But a game with no community to support it will not last long (or not at all).
We will start a crowdfunding campaign and also try to Steam Greenlight our game later on. However, what we care the most is having everyone of you following us. Your hints and feedback are extremely valuable to us! We want to make a game most of you would enjoy as much as we do. Become our community!


For more info, don't be shy and reply!
Also, don't forget to visit our website.
